#include <stdio.h>
#include <set>
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

multiset<int> set1,set2;
multiset<int>::iterator f1,f2;
multiset<int>::reverse_iterator r1,r2;
int size,s1,s2;

int main()
{
    int N,x,ch;
    scanf("%d",&N);
    while(N--){
        scanf("%d",&ch);
        if(ch == 1){
            scanf("%d",&x);
            size++;
            if(size <= 3) set1.insert(x);
            else{
                f2 = set2.begin();
                if(x > *f2){
                    int ele = *f2;
                    set2.erase(f2);
                    set1.insert(ele);
                    set2.insert(x);
                }
                else set1.insert(x);
            }
            if(size%3 == 0){
                r1 = set1.rbegin();
                int ele = *r1;
                set1.erase(set1.find(ele));
                set2.insert(ele);
            }
        }
        else{
            if(size <= 2) puts("No reviews yet");
            else printf("%d\n",*set2.begin());
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
